snippet: On the first day of the trial of Chelsea’s captain, John Terry, in London, Anton Ferdinand of Queens Park Rangers told of his anger that an on-pitch confrontation descended into racism.
abstract: Anton Ferdinand of Queens Park Rangers testifies on the first day of the trial of Chelsea captain John Terry, who is accused of racially abusing Ferdinand during a Premier League match; other soccer items noted.
lead_paragraph: On the first day of the trial of Chelsea’s captain, John Terry, in London, Anton Ferdinand of Queens Park Rangers told of his anger that an on-pitch confrontation descended into racism.
